author: frozenfire.eth
content:
I'm writing a semi-technical article on how ENS gateways should work, and part of the explanation needs to be rooted in how Ethereum's state tree works.

I'm avoiding devolving into a hamfisted explanation of merkle trees in the article. Does anyone have a good existing explainer for how Ethereum's state tree works, which a relatively non-technical audience could understand?

author: frozenfire.eth
content: Someone suggested https://ethereum.stackexchange.com/questions/6415/eli5-how-does-a-merkle-patricia-trie-tree-work, but that seems about 20% too technical for the average crypto user.
